item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI O3-Mini (720 points | 660 comments)
2. Bypass DeepSeek censorship by speaking in hex (472 points | 254 comments)
3. Earthstar – A database for private, distributed, offline-first applications (144 points | 17 comments)
4. Show HN: Perforator – cluster-wide profiling tool for large data centers (9 points | 5 comments)
5. In Zig, what's a writer? (27 points | 8 comments)
6. Shades of Blunders (9 points | discuss)
7. Hoppscotch: Open source alternative to Postman / Insomnia (54 points | 30 comments)
8. Elite on the 6502: The original 6502 assembly source, heavily commented (155 points | 29 comments)
9. Sparrow, a modern C++ implementation of the Apache Arrow columnar format (68 points | 11 comments)
10. Why Tracebit is written in C# (86 points | 85 comments)
11. AI and two hundred dollar tasks (57 points | 46 comments)
12. FBI, Dutch police disrupt 'Manipulaters' phishing gang (131 points | 45 comments)
13. The Tensor Cookbook (2024) (138 points | 17 comments)
14. Auto-Differentiating Any LLM Workflow: A Farewell to Manual Prompting (21 points | 5 comments)
15. Scientists find links between Alzheimer's, herpes, and head trauma (116 points | 37 comments)
16. Show HN: Uscope, a new Linux debugger written from scratch (213 points | 112 comments)
17. The Severance writer and cast on corporate cults, sci-fi, and more (9 points | 1 comment)
18. Falsehoods programmers believe about null pointers (66 points | 58 comments)
19. Running DeepSeek R1 Models Locally on NPU (19 points | 5 comments)
20. Notes on OpenAI o3-mini (133 points | 51 comments)
21. Zusie – My Relay Computer (114 points | 30 comments)
22. Hell is overconfident developers writing encryption code (112 points | 130 comments)
23. Norway's wealth fund now worth $319,900 per citizen (31 points | 27 comments)
24. Better Know a Ruby Thing: Singleton Classes (104 points | 17 comments)
25. Fixing E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial for the Atari 2600 (2013) (114 points | 37 comments)
26. Show HN: Lua-libuv – A Lua with libuv experiments (36 points | 1 comment)
27. Living with Nausea: My Story in Six Charts (127 points | 60 comments)
28. FurtherAI (YC W24) Is Hiring engineers and researchers to build Vertical AI agents ( | hide)
29. Show HN: Simple to build MCP servers that easily connect with custom LLM calls (30 points | 15 comments)
30. List of 200 UK companies that moved to 4-day working week (9 points | discuss)
